data.eml:eml: Potamalpheops tyrymembe sp. n.: the first southwestern Atlantic species of the shrimp genus Potamalpheops Powell, 1979 (Caridea: Alpheidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Soledade, Guidomar O., Santos, Patricia S., Almeida, Alexandre O. (2014): Potamalpheops tyrymembe sp. n.: the first southwestern Atlantic species of the shrimp genus Potamalpheops Powell, 1979 (Caridea: Alpheidae). Zootaxa 3760 (4): 579-586, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.226557
